html.body:
Dear author,
your data publication is released and online. The assigned DOI is:
$newId
DOI's are resolved to an URL using the DOI resolving service. Alternatively, you may use http://dx.doi.org/$newId to link your data set directly.
Furthermore, you find useful services at your related DataCite record to share your citation and load into your favourite citation manager.
Please give credit and cite e!DAL:
Daniel Arend et al. e!DAL - a framework to store, share and publish research data. BMC Bioinformatics 15(214), 2014.
Thanks for using the e!DAL research data publication system!
